title: Hard Luck Love Song
snippet: Drawn from the plotline of a Todd Snider song, the film follows a pool shark and an escort, taking twists that are both violent and silly.
keywords: subject: Movies;persons: Dorman, Michael (1981- );creative_works: Hard Luck Love Song (Movie);persons: Bush, Sophia (1982- );
headline.main: ‘Hard Luck Love Song’ Review: A Glossy Take on a Gritty Tune
overview: Jesse, a charismatic but down on his luck troubadour, finds himself at an existential crossroads as bad choices catch up with him during an unexpected reunion with Carla, an old flame.
details_overview: Jesse, a charismatic but down on his luck troubadour, finds himself at an existential crossroads as bad choices catch up with him during an unexpected reunion with Carla, an old flame.

title: Falling Inn Love
snippet: It’s hard to find a reliable, talented, reasonably priced, eco-friendly contractor these days.
keywords: subject: Movies;organizations: Netflix Inc;persons: Kumble, Roger;persons: Milian, Christina;persons: Demos, Adam;creative_works: Falling Inn Love (Movie);
headline.main: ‘Falling Inn Love’ Review: A Prize That Needs Some Work
headline.print_headline: A Fine Romance to Watch While Sorting Socks
overview: When a San Francisco exec wins a New Zealand inn, she ditches city life to remodel and flip the rustic property with help from a handsome contractor.
details_overview: When a San Francisco exec wins a New Zealand inn, she ditches city life to remodel and flip the rustic property with help from a handsome contractor.

title: Cyrano, My Love
snippet: This superficial take on the writing and initial staging of “Cyrano de Bergerac” is a whirlwind of soapy declarations and backstage chaos.
keywords: subject: Movies;creative_works: Cyrano, My Love (Movie);persons: Michalik, Alexis;
headline.main: ‘Cyrano, My Love’ Review: A Nose for Romance
overview: Paris, France, December 1897. The young playwright Edmond Rostand feels like a failure. Inspiration has abandoned him. Married and father of two children, desperate and penniless, he persuades the great actor Constant Coquelin to perform the main role in his new play. But there is a problem: Coquelin wants to premiere it at Christmas and Edmond has not written a single word.
details_overview: Paris, France, December 1897. The young playwright Edmond Rostand feels like a failure. Inspiration has abandoned him. Married and father of two children, desperate and penniless, he persuades the great actor Constant Coquelin to perform the main role in his new play. But there is a problem: Coquelin wants to premiere it at Christmas and Edmond has not written a single word.

title: Five Feet Apart
snippet: Haley Lu Richardson and Cole Sprouse navigate the rules of attraction and of a hospital in this film about living with cystic fibrosis.
keywords: subject: Movies;creative_works: Five Feet Apart (Movie);persons: Baldoni, Justin;
headline.main: ‘Five Feet Apart’ Review: Ailing Teenagers Live Dangerously for Love
overview: Seventeen-year-old Stella spends most of her time in the hospital as a cystic fibrosis patient. Her life is full of routines, boundaries and self-control — all of which get put to the test when she meets Will, an impossibly charming teen who has the same illness. There's an instant flirtation, though restrictions dictate that they must maintain a safe distance between them. As their connection intensifies, so does the temptation to throw the rules out the window and embrace that attraction.
details_overview: Seventeen-year-old Stella spends most of her time in the hospital as a cystic fibrosis patient. As their connection intensifies, so does the temptation to throw the rules out the window and embrace that attraction.

title: I Love My Dad
snippet: This comedy is a daddy-issues movie with a queasy premise truly made for these times.

headline.main: ‘I Love My Dad’ Review: A Father Catfishes His Son
headline.print_headline: A Father Catfishes His Son. We Just Wait for the Ick.
overview: A hopelessly estranged father catfishes his son in an attempt to reconnect.
details_overview: A hopelessly estranged father catfishes his son in an attempt to reconnect.

title: Asako I & II
snippet: The Japanese director Ryusuke Hamaguchi follows up his marathon “Happy Hour” with a story of love among young urbanites.
keywords: subject: Movies;creative_works: Asako I & II (Movie);persons: Hamaguchi, Ryusuke;
headline.main: ‘Asako I & II’ Review: Double the Love (and the Heartbreak)
headline.print_headline: Falling For a Drifter And His Lookalike
overview: College student Asako falls in love at first sight with Baku after meeting at a photography exhibit. Romance sparks between the two but doesn't last long when Baku suddenly disappears from her life. Two years later, she spots a man that bears a striking resemblance to him. Even though it is only his physical similarities to Baku that attracted her to him, she doesn't say so and starts dating the soft-spoken young man called Ryohei.

title: Ammonite
snippet: Kate Winslet’s fossil hunter and Saoirse Ronan’s convalescent embark on a forbidden seaside romance.
keywords: subject: Movies;persons: Ronan, Saoirse;persons: Winslet, Kate;persons: Lee, Francis (1969- );creative_works: Ammonite (Movie);
overview: In 1840s England, palaeontologist Mary Anning and a young woman sent by her husband to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship. Despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably.
details_overview: Upon discovering an SD card on a beach from 2009, an autistic trans woman looks through a decade of cringe photos in her camera roll to see who she’s become.

title: About Fate
snippet: Thomas Mann’s beguiling performance drives this Emma Roberts vehicle, but the romantic comedy creaks under the weight of its coincidences.
keywords: subject: Movies;creative_works: About Fate (Movie);persons: Vaysberg, Marius;persons: Mann, Thomas (1991- );persons: Roberts, Emma (1991- );
headline.main: ‘About Fate’ Review: Love the One You’re With?
overview: Two strangers believe in love but never seem to be able to find its true meaning. In a wild twist of events, fate puts each in the other's path on one stormy New Year's Eve.
details_overview: Two strangers believe in love but never seem to be able to find its true meaning. In a wild twist of events, fate puts each in the other's path on one stormy New Year's Eve.

title: Love Wedding Repeat
snippet: A couple’s reception becomes a disaster (or does it?) in this comedy of multiple errors.
keywords: subject: Movies;creative_works: Love Wedding Repeat (Movie);persons: Craig, Dean (1974- );persons: Claflin, Sam;persons: Munn, Olivia;
headline.main: ‘Love Wedding Repeat’ Review: A Tumble Down the Aisle
overview: While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl that got away in alternate versions of the same day.
details_overview: While trying to make his sister's wedding day go smoothly, Jack finds himself juggling an angry ex-girlfriend, an uninvited guest with a secret, a misplaced sleep sedative, and the girl that got away in alternate versions of the same day.

title: Love Hard
snippet: When a perennially single journalist travels across the country to meet her dream guy, she finds she’s been catfished.
keywords: subject: Movies;creative_works: Love Hard (Movie);persons: Jimenez, Hernan;
headline.main: ‘Love Hard’ Review: Seeking Connection, Not Perfection
overview: An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for Christmas, only to discover that she's been catfished. But the object of her affection actually lives in the same town, and the guy who duped her offers to set them up if she pretends to be his own girlfriend for the holidays.

title: 69: The Saga of Danny Hernandez
snippet: The rise and fall of the provocative rapper Tekashi69 is chronicled in this Hulu documentary.
keywords: subject: Documentary Films and Programs;subject: Rap and Hip-Hop;persons: Gandhi, Vikram;persons: 6ix9ine (Rapper);creative_works: 69: The Saga of Danny Hernandez (Movie);
headline.main: ‘69: The Saga of Danny Hernandez’ Review: A SoundCloud-Rap Rat
headline.print_headline: Loved in Hip-Hop, but Loathed in the End
overview: Part investigative documentary, part real-life gangster movie, this film unpacks the life of polarizing rap sensation and internet troll Tekashi69, aka 69, while chronicling his meteoric rise and fall from fame.
